ing: 1/4 cup prepared horseradish, or to taste
des: "This spicy dip recipe is great for dipping almost any thing worth dipping."
ins: In a medium bowl, stir together the sour cream, horseradish and lemon juice. Season with salt, paprika, garlic salt and minced onion. Mix and then chill for about 20 minutes to let the flavors blend before you start dipping.
